name: Melankolia
description:
"BLOOM"

season I

"
not on griefs nor tragedy.
neither when losing nor parting.
or all the bittersweet encounters we're having.

when all other things are felt instant
Melancholy, it slows down. for us.

Melancholy, the sweet sweet melancholy
exists by itself. for us. 
"

MELANKOLIA

_koda, 2021


-
animated by Hand using digital painting.
